p: The aim of the present study was to evaluate the applicability of CAP for inactivation of viruses in water from closed irrigation systems. We chose PVY NTN as the model virus because of its demonstrated water transmissibility and economic relevance. We showed that CAP can inactivate high concentrations of PVY NTN in nutrient solution after only 1Â min of treatment and suggested that the inactivation is mainly mediated by the formation of reactive oxygen species.
